channel.title: Vote for Cash help required
channel.description:
I followed 1776's vote for cash system but I want to have some changes in it. I want like three URLs; the user has to vote on all those 3 websites and then he can submit his username to receive reward. I'm unable to find any suitable tut or any help.
I've no knowledge in Php, a lil bit maybe, but I wonder if someone could help me up
Thanks Sagi

item.title: Vote for Cash help required
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Well the tutorial you are using just bases one link to the cookie. You would have to set the cookie to work off 3 checks. That’s hard.

Read full topic
